explains: v. 扭曲，使失真；歪曲，曲解

sentences.en: A painter may exaggerate or distort shapes and forms.
sentences.cn: 画家可能会夸大或扭曲形状与形式。

sentences.en: They could distort the achievement-based system of peer-review-led research.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会扭曲以同行评审为导向、以学术成就基础的研究体系。

sentences.en: How can you portray something exactly as it is and at the same time distort it with emotions?
sentences.cn: 你怎么可能一边完全客观的作画，一边又带有感情的去使之变形呢？
